creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: figure with pointed ears and long beard, wearing glasses and a very tall conical hat with circular Art-Deco pattern and long cape with scroll motifs in dotted lines, seated, reading a book, with a quill pen in an ink bottle beside book; tall candle in candle holder at left; flowers and large spider web in background; more books in LLC; ornate floral border with insects
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
signed: LRC inside border, in white: [R / H]
title: Professor
